body_html:
The cudaIPc* functions indeed seem to be the hope for interprocess p2p communication. I am not sure how the CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES play in this scenario though since the processes see different sets of GPUs (e.g., PS process sees GPU#0 while Worker process sees GPU#1).

I wondered if you would consider incorporating this feature to the next patch? In any case, I really appreciate your effort in receiving feature requests from end users and trying to listen the needs!
